title: RNA aggregate metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for aggregate metrics of multiple RNA-seq libraries.

filtered_bcs_transcriptome_union.title: Filtered bcs transcriptome union
filtered_bcs_transcriptome_union.description: Estimated number of barcodes associated with cell-containing partitions, summed across all input libraries.

total_reads.title: Total reads
total_reads.description: Total number of sequenced reads, summed across all input libraries.

multi_transcriptome_total_raw_reads_per_.title: Multi transcriptome total raw reads per filtered bc
multi_transcriptome_total_raw_reads_per_.description: Reads per cell-containing barcodes, calculated by total_reads divided by filtered_bcs_transcriptome_union.

lowest_frac_reads_kept.title: Lowest frac reads kept
lowest_frac_reads_kept.description: Lowest fraction of reads retained, corresponding to the library which lost the most reads during normalization.

library_metrics.title: Library metrics
library_metrics.description: Metrics of reads per library prior to and after depth normalization.

items.title: Library metric
items.description: Metric of reads per library prior to and after depth normalization.

library.title: Library
library.description: The Library object representation that these metrics describe.

pre_normalization_raw_reads_per_filtered.title: Prenormalization raw reads per filtered bc
pre_normalization_raw_reads_per_filtered.description: The mean total reads per cell prior to depth normalization.

pre_normalization_cmb_reads_per_filtered.title: Prenormalization cmb reads per filtered bc
pre_normalization_cmb_reads_per_filtered.description: The mean confidently mapped and barcoded (CMB) reads per cell prior to depth normalization.

frac_reads_kept.title: Fraction of reads kept
frac_reads_kept.description: The fraction of reads that were retained after depth normalization.
